abstract: A puzzle from Caleb Madison and his J.A.S.A. crossword puzzle class.
snippet: A puzzle from Caleb Madison and his J.A.S.A. crossword puzzle class.
lead_paragraph: FRIDAY'S PUZZLE - The last time we saw Caleb Madison at the helm of the J.A.S.A. class, (Across Lite, Solution, blog) he was encouraging them to flaunt their "IT" factor. Now, with Mr. Madison off getting a good education at Yale, the constructor Ian Livengood has taken over teaching the class, and they continue to construct. Good for them, I say, because they continue to crank out some very nice puzzles.
